Guren completely encases her opponents in pink crystal using the surface beneath them. When shattered, the bodies of the victims disintegrate along with the crystal particles. It is shown through examination with [[Shino]]'s [[kikaichū]] that those affected by the technique are covered in a frostbite-like pattern.
